# Luganodes X Bitpanda: Empowering Europe’s Fintech Frontier

Luganodes is now a Staking Provider for Bitpanda.

![](data:image/svg+xml;charset=utf-8,%3Csvg%20height='675'%20width='1200'%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20version='1.1'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

![](data:image/png;base64,)![Cover
Image](/static/698c636012fc983883e7d23ef38949c2/bb8ee/image_97_48ab6e0c77.png)![Cover
Image](/static/698c636012fc983883e7d23ef38949c2/bb8ee/image_97_48ab6e0c77.png)

Published on

31 Jan, 2024

Copy
Link[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Check%20out%20this%20blog%20by%20Luganodes%20-%20%22Luganodes%20X%20Bitpanda%3A%20Empowering%20Europe%E2%80%99s%20Fintech%20Frontier%22&url=)[](https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-
offsite/?url=&title=Luganodes%20X%20Bitpanda%3A%20Empowering%20Europe%E2%80%99s%20Fintech%20Frontier&summary=Check%20out%20this%20blog%20by%20Luganodes%20-%20%22Luganodes%20X%20Bitpanda%3A%20Empowering%20Europe%E2%80%99s%20Fintech%20Frontier%22)

# Introduction

[Austrian fintech unicorn](https://www.bitpanda.com/en), Bitpanda, has
enhanced its staking offers through a partnership with Luganodes. As a result,
Bitpanda customers can stake their assets via Luganodes' institutional-grade
staking services directly from within the Bitpanda dashboard and app.

# Bitpanda

Bitpanda, established in 2014 in Vienna, Austria, has emerged as a leading
name in Europe's financial technology sector. As a testament to its success,
the company boasts a robust customer base exceeding 4 million retail
investors. This substantial reach reflects Bitpanda's commitment to making
investing accessible to a broad audience. Today, Bitpanda remains notable as a
crypto exchange platform and an all-in-one investment solution for individuals
and institutions alike.

As an investor, you can invest in Soybean Oil, Platinum, and Ethereum through
the same portal! Bitpanda stands out for offering multiple investment
opportunities via an easy-to-access interface. Going a step further, Bitpanda
provides a range of features and educational content, enhancing its
accessibility for new investors.

# Licensed and Trusted

The company stands out for its comprehensive range of licences and
registrations. Bitpanda is registered as a Virtual Asset Service Provider
(VASP) in several European countries, including Austria, Germany, France,
Spain, Italy, the Czech Republic, and Sweden. This status underlines its
compliance with stringent Anti-Money Laundering (AML) and Know Your Customer
(KYC) regulations across these nations.

Additionally, Bitpanda holds the Markets in Financial Instruments Directive
(MiFID) II licence, which is passportable across European borders, further
illustrating its adherence to high investment business standards to protect
investors and ensure market transparency. Based out of Austria, Bitpanda fully
adheres to the Financial Markets Authority and EU regulators, ensuring that
customers’ funds are managed by a company with a legally verifiable business
model.

# Institutional Offerings

Bitpanda's unique offerings include its Bitpanda Custody service, a custodial
wallet platform, offering institutional-level security for managing
cryptocurrency assets. It is designed for ease of use, automating the
management process for institutional investors, service providers, token
issuers, and corporate treasuries. This feature aligns with their broader aim
of simplifying and securing digital asset investment. Moreover, Bitpanda
Business allows businesses to invest available resources in over 3,000 digital
assets, ensuring safety, security, and regulatory compliance.

Via Bitpanda Technology Solutions, the company offers a compelling API and a
modular infrastructure. This has led to collaborations with neo-banks such as
N26, Lydia and Plum.

N26, a leading neobank from Germany, offers a broad range of crypto assets in
a regulatory-compliant manner via Bitpanda's API solution. This partnership
allows N26 to provide its customers with a comprehensive selection of over 150
digital coins, one of the most extensive offerings available through a digital
bank.

# Luganodes Partnership

A shared emphasis on European compliance, investor insurance, institutional
focus, and accessibility has aligned Luganodes with Bitpanda's objectives.
This synergy has led to a noteworthy agreement, positioning [Luganodes' Swiss-
grade infrastructure](https://www.luganodes.com/) as the cornerstone of
Bitpanda's staking operations for many major crypto assets such as Tron,
Polkadot and more. This collaboration underscores both companies' joint
commitment to providing state-of-the-art security and efficiency in the
digital asset management industry.

The partnership entails Luganodes being a leading staking provider. The
technicalities of setting up, maintaining and monitoring validator nodes are
taken care of by our team, enabling Bitpanda to provide high-quality services
to an increasing number of customers. For clarification, Luganodes never gets
access to private keys entrusted to Bitpanda. Bitpanda clients simply take
advantage of Luganodes infrastructure from within the Bitpanda ecosystem.

Speaking of the Luganodes Advantage, as a part of this partnership, Bitpanda
receives Chainproof External Insurance by default. This insurance provides a
safety net in the unlikely event of security breaches or slashing. No matter
what the situation is, this insurance guarantees that there will be no
financial loss. This protection extends to Bitpanda customers who are engaged
in staking through Luganodes' validator services.

In our dedication to maintaining exceptional support standards, Luganodes
offers additional services such as Reporting APIs. These APIs enable Bitpanda
to obtain crucial, real-time information regarding staking. This includes data
on staked balances, earned rewards, transaction specifics, and other vital
staking-related details. We ensure that our APIs are not only robust and
efficient but also deliver accurate and up-to-date information.

# Conclusion

Bitpanda's growth and vision have consistently balanced the needs of
individuals and institutions. It is evident that Bitpanda will continue to see
further growth, as they recognise that in the current scenario, offering
investment options beyond Web3 is as important as expanding into the
widespread usage of cryptocurrencies. As partners, we at Luganodes continue to
support their endeavours, particularly in staking and reporting, and aim to
grow in tandem.

## Work with Luganodes

Much like Bitpanda, your organization can also take advantage of our top-tier
Web3 infrastructure. As a rapidly expanding company, we are enthusiastic about
forming new partnerships and cultivating enduring relationships. If our
offerings resonate with your needs, please feel free to reach out to us at
[hello@luganodes.com](mailto:hello@luganodes.com).

## About Luganodes

Luganodes is a world-class, Swiss-operated, non-custodial blockchain
infrastructure provider that has rapidly gained recognition in the industry
for offering institutional-grade services. It was born out of the Lugano Plan
B Program, an initiative driven by Tether and the City of Lugano. Luganodes
maintains an exceptional 99.9% uptime with round-the-clock monitoring by SRE
experts. With support for 40+ PoS networks, it ranks among the top validators
on Polygon, Polkadot, Sui, and Tron. Luganodes prioritizes security and
compliance, holding the distinction of being one of the first staking
providers to adhere to all SOC 2 Type II, GDPR, and ISO 27001 standards as
well as offering Chainproof insurance to institutional clients.
